mapper.select: select house_seq , house_photourl, house_name, house_status from house_info where house_host_id = #{value} ORDER BY house_seq ASC

select reservation_seq,reservation_customer_id,reservation_house_seq, to_char(reservation_check_in,'yyyy/MM/dd') as reservation_check_in, to_char(reservation_check_out,'yyyy/MM/dd') as reservation_check_out, to_char(reservation_regdate,'yyyy/MM/dd') as reservation_regdate ,c.customer_name as customer_name, c.customer_image as customer_image, c.customer_email as customer_email, c.customer_phone as customer_phone from reservation join customer c on reservation_customer_id = c.customer_id where reservation_house_seq = #{house_seq} and reservation_check_in > sysdate ORDER BY reservation_seq

select reservation_seq,reservation_customer_id,reservation_house_seq, to_char(reservation_check_in,'yyyy/MM/dd') as reservation_check_in, to_char(reservation_check_out,'yyyy/MM/dd') as reservation_check_out, to_char(reservation_regdate,'yyyy/MM/dd') as reservation_regdate ,c.customer_name as customer_name, c.customer_image as customer_image, c.customer_email as customer_email, c.customer_phone as customer_phone from reservation join customer c on reservation_customer_id = c.customer_id where reservation_house_seq = #{house_seq} and reservation_check_in < sysdate ORDER BY reservation_seq

SELECT to_date(to_char(host_sales_regdate,'YYYY'),'YYYY') as host_sales_regdate,sum(host_sales) as host_sales FROM host_sales WHERE to_char(host_sales_regdate, 'yyyy') >= #{searchConditionFirst} and to_char(host_sales_regdate,'yyyy') <= #{searchConditionSecond} and host_id = #{host_id} GROUP BY to_date(to_char(host_sales_regdate,'YYYY'),'YYYY') ORDER BY to_date(to_char(host_sales_regdate,'YYYY'),'YYYY') ASC

SELECT to_date(to_char(host_sales_regdate,'MM'),'MM') as host_sales_regdate,sum(host_sales) as host_sales FROM host_sales WHERE to_char(host_sales_regdate, 'yyyy') = #{searchConditionFirst} and host_id = #{host_id} GROUP BY to_date(to_char(host_sales_regdate,'MM'),'MM') ORDER BY to_date(to_char(host_sales_regdate,'MM'),'MM') ASC

SELECT to_date(to_char(host_sales_regdate,'MM/dd'),'MM/dd') as host_sales_regdate,sum(host_sales) as host_sales FROM host_sales WHERE to_char(host_sales_regdate, 'YYYY-MM') = #{searchConditionFirst} GROUP BY to_date(to_char(host_sales_regdate,'MM/dd'),'MM/dd') ORDER BY to_date(to_char(host_sales_regdate,'MM/dd'),'MM/dd') ASC

SELECT admin_sales_seq, admin_sales, admin_sales_house_seq, to_char(admin_sales_regdate,'YYYY/MM/dd') as admin_sales_date FROM admin_sales WHERE to_char(admin_sales_regdate,'YYYY-MM-dd') = #{admin_sales_date}

SELECT host_house_seq, sum(host_sales) as host_sales, to_char(host_sales_regdate,'yyyy') as host_sales_date FROM host_sales WHERE to_char(host_sales_regdate, 'yyyy') >= #{searchConditionFirst} and to_char(host_sales_regdate,'yyyy') <= #{searchConditionSecond} and host_id = #{host_id} group by host_house_seq, to_char(host_sales_regdate,'yyyy') order by host_house_seq, to_char(host_sales_regdate,'yyyy')

SELECT host_house_seq, sum(host_sales) as host_sales, to_char(host_sales_regdate,'yyyy/MM') as host_sales_date FROM host_sales WHERE to_char(host_sales_regdate, 'yyyy') = #{searchConditionFirst} and host_id = #{host_id} group by host_house_seq, to_char(host_sales_regdate,'yyyy/MM') order by host_house_seq, to_char(host_sales_regdate,'yyyy/MM')
